channel.title: Posts on Remotely Managed
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Remotely Managed

item.title: First Post
item.description: Nice to meet you. I’m Fred. Welcome to the Remotely Managed blog. I’m here to talk about my interests in technology and Digi Remote Manager. I work for Digi Interational, as a senior engineer, on Digi Remote Manager. Remote Manager. Remote Manager lets you manage your large fleet of Digi IoT devices. We have a lot of features, the normal sort of “list your device inventory”, “do firmware updates” to the more esoteric “run automation scripts against all your devices”, “update settings on every device in your fleet” and other things.
